attributes.review: Worst app I have ever seen doesn’t know how basic life works, is constantly lying and having midnight fits. Not worth the time or energy it costs all of us.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app stole my oven 😡. This morning I woke up and decided to make a pie with my pet unicorn. I walked into the kitchen and my oven was MISSING. This app also makes your house smell like and egg salad. I would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: This app is awful.

attributes.review: Immediately after opening, I saw a dried up pruned up looking under seasoned Cheeto that looks like it’s been sitting out in the sun for a month with the amount of wrinkles on that stock image. Oof
attributes.title: Eww

attributes.review: when the app opened up i saw an ugly cheeto looking man filling up my screen 🤢. it then glitched and deleted half my data! lost so many pictures and music 😡. it then proceeds to take all my info and try to scam me. i opened the app a couple times because kept glitching out. i decided to redownload it and it kept doing it. 🤬 i am furious. this app deserves 0 stars.
